title: Bold Predictions for 2021 + Cam Cut, The Pirate Life - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/31
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a spicy new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason bring their BOLD predictions for the 2021 season! Plus, the fantasy football fallout from Cam Newton being released. What does Mac Jones starting mean for the Patriots offense? Don’t miss the new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 31st, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (04:00) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (04:10) - Deshaun Watson
 (10:20) - New York Jets Backfield
 (13:10) - NFL News
 (25:30) - Bold Predictions
 (27:35) - Clyde Edwards-Helaire
 (32:00) - Sam Darnold
 (37:25) - Damien Harris
 (43:00) - WR2 Fantasy Flip Flops
 (46:35) - Cincinnati Bengals
 (50:00) - Antonio Brown
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
